thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Account Executive - Chicago - Sports Media

title: Account Executive - Chicago - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: The Account Executive will be responsible for ad sales for a defined territory within the region. This includes new business development, maintenance of existing accounts, and meeting revenue budgets.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
